title: Input schema for Yell Business Scraper
description: Provide one or more search keywords and a location to scrape business listings from Yell.

keywords.title: Search keywords
keywords.description: Business categories or services to search for on Yell (e.g. Plumbers, Dentists).

location.title: Location
location.description: City, region, or country where the search should be performed.

limit.title: Maximum results
limit.description: Maximum number of unique businesses to scrape.
